This game smells like shit , but I wonder why I still play in this AZZ_GAME many bugs , lags , cheaters and  game engine that is outdated How many times did I run this game and my chair turned to coal my ass burned with anger every time the game did not register a headshot.

It's an arcade-based shooter with unrealistic movements and shooting but it's built a huge following around it's competitiveness. It does a lot of things wrong but somehow still seems to be enjoyable!
